description: This file initializes a vector database using ChromaDB, creates a PDF-based knowledge base, loads the knowledge, and interacts with an agent to generate a response based on the knowledge base.

classes.name: ChromaDb
classes.description: A class representing the Chroma vector database, used for storing and retrieving vector embeddings.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, integrating with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and generates responses.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, recreating the index if specified.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on a query, optionally in markdown format.
